meanings: 초대와 방문 Have you been waiting?
wait, hold on, (informal) hang on; (예정된 일·사람 등을) expect, (formal) await; (고대하다) look forward to
약속 Did you have to wait long?
약속 Have you been waiting for a long time?
약속 When did you get here?
레스토랑 SOS I've been waiting for 30 minutes already.
실용회화-약속을 어겼을 때 I've been waiting for an hour.
